TopicTitle: Mod to change the current mission flag during flight [ANSWERED]

Articles.Content:
As the title says, I know no mods that have an ability to change the mission flag on the fly. With the release of Historian mod many people encountered a strong need to change the mission flag for screenshot purposes. We usually forget to set the mission flag during construction in VAB, and in some cases it's impossible. For example after launching a rocket with two vessels designed for different mission or constructing a ship via KIS addon.

I know how to do it via save editing, but that's a time consuming workaround.

Edited July 14, 2015 by Enceos
